name: closefriend
text: The measure of a man is whether or not he will go all pro ice when he is in a raw situation.

name: lucid
text: To go all pro ice in a raw situation is to be a coward who would desert a dying man.

name: soticoto
text:
To go all pro ice in a raw situation is the merciful thing to do, and favours all.
To finish off a dying man is the very opposite of deserting him.

name: werthog42
text: I *must* find a place to use RB's last quote there. "We got the chessboard out, but you're playing Whac-a-mole." Hee.

name: jamers
text: A comment left by jamers was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, fancypants, scraggg, Darthemed)

name: shmuckeles
text: A comment left by shmuckeles was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, fancypants, prettyrad, scraggg, Darthemed)

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by edd36, RedGuy, d3athcann0n, sdskyle, ConnorMc)

name: i_love_kate
text: Would have been better if you were more subtle about your pride in it.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Rhadamanthus, daidai, riotdejaneiro, invidious, sevenarts, neaner, milkpants, MortisInvictus, Talbain, LordPretzel, RedGuy, d3athcann0n, sdskyle, ConnorMc, logic, eddylee)

name: andyfaewatford
text:
Damnit zefiel, you only got a chubby off me because I'm reading all the strips in order and thought you had actually come up with that line yourself...

I shall be less liberal with chubbies in future.

name: mugi
text: Same.  I feel betrayed.

name: rowboat
text: V-lame. So hard.

name: senseihollywood
text:
How about this (actually predates the strip):

McCain: Whack-a-mole in Iraq

name: senseihollywood
text:
Sorry...Assetbar went and got the chessboard out on me, and I'll got is this little mallet...
McCain: Whack-a-Mole in Iraq

name: senseihollywood
text:
*all I got is...

ah fuck it, I'm typing like I've got altitude sickness today...

I'm just gonna go drink a Bullshit Sunrise and have some nachos...

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Just piss off a serial murderer, then hope he gets hoist on his own murdering device petard! Simple!

name: dirtyantaeus
text: I think Ray could have pulled off having a leg for a hat.

name: madnes
text: I think so too.

name: puguglypress
text: Good avatar/comment combo. It looks like Beef is just all reasonably agreeing with dirtyantaeus.

name: i_love_kate
text: Totally misread that as "I think Ray could have pulled off a leg for a hat." Which kind of made sense as well.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: completely the guy who could do it.

name: roccolieuallen
text: Beef's last line is like Achewood Haiku in its economy and effect.  What brilliant comic writing this is.

name: catachresis
text:
Who lamed this comment
This man has nailed it on

name: deusoma
text: That comment has zero lames, friend.

name: saint
text:
poor man don't know his numbers.
on an unrelated note, is that Hugh Laurie in your avatar?

name: tagrineth
text: Yeah, it's Hugh Laurie and it says "it's never lupus" at the bottom

name: deusoma
text: I suspect that someone lamed that comment for no other reason than to make me look like a jackass. That or I broke my personal rule about not combining incredible amounts of alcohol and the Internet.

name: tombsgrave
text: A classic, both visually (leghat) and literarily (chessboard Whac-a-Mole).

name: asherdan
text: It's really appropriate that Nice Pete wears the Chuck Taylors, y'know.

name: spinynorman
text: I'd reference Kevin from Sin City, but Nice Pete has so much background that at this point he is his Own Thing

name: snowman
text: nice pete is totally his own thing

name: dougthehead
text: Also appropriate that Ray leaves them on. Shame to waste some Chucks.

name: aghbar
text: Also, I like the detailin' in the shoes.

name: nurdbot
text: A little reminder, the iKnife is still hella stabbing passed out Nice Pete.

name: speedwell
text: i respectfully disagree as there is no chorus of spluts

name: wehavemagnums
text: A comment left by wehavemagnums was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by featurelessvoid, purplehaze, equinn2006, shogun, nutmeg, echidnaboy, I_Love_Kate)

name: phoenixultima
text: I totally want to wear a dismembered leg as a hat. I'm not sure what that says about my mental health, but it's probably not good.

name: zapatos
text: I know what it says about your fashion sense.

name: anticitizen
text: hella retro

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: I mean, this one is definitely all kinds of funny, especially with the hat and roast beef all calling Ray out on not being pro-ice, but it always felt like a pretty contrived way to hold on to Nice Pete.

name: connellingus
text: Surely they also remember how temporary death is in the Achewood universe. If they let Pete die, he would come after them sooner or later.

name: jackparsons
text: Pete's too dumb to make it out of the Friendly's bathroom.

name: heyman
text: He is of low mind

name: cpnglxynchos
text: the walls have ears

name: wozzeck
text: Nice Pete is not a stupid, he is simply a dreamer whose thoughts were never fashioned to fit the locks of this world.

name: hyetal
text:
Nice Pete would find a way to murder the Friendly's bathroom.

connellingus makes a good point. This one had always bothered me because... Nice Pete's an escaped fugitive, isn't he? Who's going to say, "Why, Nice Pete hasn't come to work lately, I shall go to his house and see what the matter is!"

But yeah, you don't want to kill a guy that'll go Todd on you later.

Except you can just come back later.

This argument makes no sense.

I lack sleep.

name: nutmeg
text: panels 4-6 is a hilarious situation.

name: hendetta
text: I wonder if Ray is waving or striking a karate pose.

name: bixschmix
text: Karate. Obviously.

name: mugi
text: Yeah, I didn't see that before, but now I like it better.

name: thegreatestcape
text:
For some reason all I can think of is the cover of "Heroes"

And as we all know, Berlin-era Bowie leg-based headwear = at least 5.

name: cdl146
text: I don't know, I think Ray could totally go pro-ice if Nice Pete was conscious. I mean, the dude stone-cold ripped a guy's jaw off. But beating on a defenseless person, that's just low.

name: deancain29
text: the last panel is one of the greatest of all time

name: cab234
text: Absolutely.  Just Grade-A Beef.

name: molesticide
text: Take.

name: illocybin
text:
Killin' is a special thing

It's a special thing you do
when you want someone to die

name: spinynorman
text: How does Beef have such insight into Nice Pete's vocabulary?

name: senseihollywood
text: it is the language of Circumstances...

name: dasilodavi
text: A comment left by dasilodavi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by saddestking, Vondicus, hectik, loneal, TheBoneOrchard, Lumus, smilebuddha, Boredom_Man, nathanielperson, nilehus, Mastronaut, I_Love_Kate)

name: quantumcasaba
text:
Anyone else imagining a slight creaking noise the rope/twine would make as Ray turns his head?
Or seeing the leg wobble a little bit?

name: nigelchaos
text: Actually. In panel 5, it looks like the leg *is* wobbling a little bit. Look at the tip of the shoe and the bone on the other end.

name: quantumcasaba
text: D'oh. Lines denote movement.

name: snowman
text: i can not believe how much i love panels 4-6, that moment is just so perfect.  that alone 5's this strip for me.

name: vermy
text: I seriously doubt anyone would bat an eyelash if a collector of curios like Ray suddenly started wearing a fresh leg hat. But that might just be me

name: wrmeade
text: yo man the leg hat that shit is HOTT on the streets, know what im sayin? straight-up TIZZITE.

name: saint
text: Any reason why the T in take is capitalized in the last panel? Just curious.

name: fineoakstructure
text: because take, in this case, means to kill, and Nice Pete feels like that's a pretty special thing.  Beef is just showing due respect.

name: greenkoolayd
text: roast beef would be right if they were talking about a normal dude.  petes got southern ways, but not necesarily the good ones...

name: greenkoolayd
text: if nice pete dissappeared, would it really be a big deal?  its not like he has family or loved ones in that community.... and ray can do whatever the hell he wants in his property, no one can see over the high-ass walls.

name: re5urgam
text: high ass-walls

name: greenkoolayd
text: now thats a whole 'nother topic right there......

name: hendetta
text:
To me the capitalization of seemingly random words in Achewood is a way to show the stressing of words and also their important.

"Doggie, we are having a Fun Time tonight!"
